page.title: 07Primary School, Crowedge.
page.content: {Dunford Hazlehead School}will close at the end of this summer term in July 1985 due to the L.E.A.finding that the school is no longer viable because of rising costs and falling rolls. The children of Infant & Junior age will transfer to other schools-most will go to {Millhouse School,}2km away. Nearly all the children arrive by public transport (bus) from their homes in the villages and scattered farms and a number (14) come from the villages of{ {Victoria}and {Dunford Bridge}just beyond the boundary of the area. Special buses will be provided from Sept, 1985. The three members of staff have also been transferred to appropriate posts in nearby schools. The school survived a previous threat of closure in 1982.
